text: Botswana has been in 11 Summer Olympics. The first time was in 1980. They have never been in the Winter Olympics. Botswana's first medal was won by Nijel Amos in 2012 in London. It earned a second medal in the 4 x 400 relay in 2020. ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes == Other websites == * Botswana profile at London2012.com * Botswana SportsReference.com Category:Sport in Botswana Category:Nations at the Olympics
title: Botswana at the Olympics
